articles.description: The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge are 'very involved' with Prince George and Princess Charlotte's homeschooling routine at Anmer Hall, royal expert Katie Nicholl told Okay! magazine
articles.content:
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge are 'very involved' with Prince George and Princess Charlotte's homeschooling routine at Anmer Hall, a royal expert has claimed.
